#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--) {
        long long n;
        scanf("%lld", &n);
        long long f=1, ans=0, temp;
        while(n) {
            f*=5;
            temp=n/5;
            temp=((temp)*(temp+1))/2;
            ans+=(temp*f);
            n/=5;
        }
        printf("%lld\n", ans);
    }
}
